trans-unit.source: Represents a decimal number.
trans-unit.target: 代表十進位數值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Decimal> value type represents decimal numbers ranging from positive 79,228,162,514,264,337,593,543,950,335 to negative 79,228,162,514,264,337,593,543,950,335.
The default value of a `Decimal` is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值`Decimal`為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Decimal> value type is appropriate for financial calculations that require large numbers of significant integral and fractional digits and no round-off errors.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Decimal>實值類型很適合需要大量的重要整數和小數的數字和沒有捨入誤差的財務計算。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Decimal> type does not eliminate the need for rounding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Decimal>型別不排除捨入的需求。

trans-unit.source: Rather, it minimizes errors due to rounding.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它最小化因為捨入錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code produces a result of 0.9999999999999999999999999999 instead of 1.
When the result of the division and multiplication is passed to the <xref:System.Math.Round%2A> method, the result suffers no loss of precision, as the following code shows.
trans-unit.target: 當除法和乘法的結果傳遞至<xref:System.Math.Round%2A>方法時，結果會因不會遺失有效位數，如下列程式碼所示。

trans-unit.source: A decimal number is a floating-point value that consists of a sign, a numeric value where each digit in the value ranges from 0 to 9, and a scaling factor that indicates the position of a floating decimal point that separates the integral and fractional parts of the numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 十進位數字是正負號所組成的浮點值、 數字的值，其中每一個數字的值範圍從 0 到 9 和縮放比例，可指出分隔的整數和小數部分的浮動小數點的位置數字值。

trans-unit.source: The binary representation of a <xref:System.Decimal> value consists of a 1-bit sign, a 96-bit integer number, and a scaling factor used to divide the 96-bit integer and specify what portion of it is a decimal fraction.
trans-unit.target: 二進位表示法<xref:System.Decimal>值組成 1 位元符號、 96 位元整數的數字，以及用來除 96 位元整數，並指定哪些部分是十進位小數的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor is implicitly the number 10, raised to an exponent ranging from 0 to 28.
trans-unit.target: 縮放比例是隱含字 10，範圍從 0 到 28 的指數。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the binary representation of a <xref:System.Decimal> value the form, ((-2<sup>96</sup> to 2<sup>96</sup>) / 10<sup>(0 to 28)</sup>), where -(2<sup>96</sup>-1) is equal to <xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>, and 2<sup>96</sup>-1 is equal to <xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: 因此的二進位表示法<xref:System.Decimal>值表單，((-2<sup>96</sup> 2<sup>96</sup>) / 10<sup>(0 至 28)</sup>)，其中-(2<sup>96</sup>-1)等於<xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>，和 2<sup>96</sup>-1 會等於<xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the binary representation of <xref:System.Decimal> values and an example, see the <xref:System.Decimal.%23ctor%28System.Int32%5B%5D%29> constructor and the <xref:System.Decimal.GetBits%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關的二進位表示法<xref:System.Decimal>值和範例，請參閱<xref:System.Decimal.%23ctor%28System.Int32%5B%5D%29>建構函式和<xref:System.Decimal.GetBits%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor also preserves any trailing zeros in a <xref:System.Decimal> number.
trans-unit.target: 縮放比例因素也會保留任何尾端零<xref:System.Decimal>數目。

trans-unit.source: Trailing zeros do not affect the value of a <xref:System.Decimal> number in arithmetic or comparison operations.
trans-unit.target: 尾端的零不會影響值<xref:System.Decimal>算術或比較運算中的數字。

trans-unit.source: However, trailing zeros might be revealed by the <xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A> method if an appropriate format string is applied.
trans-unit.target: 不過，尾端零可能會揭露所<xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A>如果套用適當的格式字串的方法。

trans-unit.source: Conversion Considerations
trans-unit.target: 轉換考量

trans-unit.source: This type provides methods that convert <xref:System.Decimal> values to and from <xref:System.SByte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64> values.
trans-unit.target: 此類型提供轉換的方法<xref:System.Decimal>值及與<xref:System.SByte>， <xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.UInt32>，和<xref:System.UInt64>值。

trans-unit.source: Conversions from these integral types to <xref:System.Decimal> are widening conversions that never lose information or throw exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 從這些整數類資料類型轉換<xref:System.Decimal>會擴展轉換，永遠不會遺失資訊或擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Conversions from <xref:System.Decimal> to any of the integral types are narrowing conversions that round the <xref:System.Decimal> value to the nearest integer value toward zero.
trans-unit.target: 從不<xref:System.Decimal>任何整數類資料類型縮小轉換的圓形<xref:System.Decimal>到最接近的整數值趨近於零的值。

trans-unit.source: Some languages, such as C#, also support the conversion of <xref:System.Decimal> values to <xref:System.Char> values.
trans-unit.target: 某些語言，例如 C# 中，也支援的轉換<xref:System.Decimal>值<xref:System.Char>值。

trans-unit.source: If the result of these conversions cannot be represented in the destination type, an <xref:System.OverflowException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些轉換的結果無法以目的型別，表示<xref:System.OverflowException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Decimal> type also provides methods that convert <xref:System.Decimal> values to and from <xref:System.Single> and <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Decimal>類型也會提供方法，來轉換<xref:System.Decimal>值及與<xref:System.Single>和<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: Conversions from <xref:System.Decimal> to <xref:System.Single> or <xref:System.Double> are narrowing conversions that might lose precision but not information about the magnitude of the converted value.
trans-unit.target: 從不<xref:System.Decimal>至<xref:System.Single>或<xref:System.Double>縮小轉換，可能會遺失有效位數，但不是有關範圍的已轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: The conversion does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 轉換不會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Conversions from <xref:System.Single> or <xref:System.Double> to <xref:System.Decimal> throw an <xref:System.OverflowException> exception if the result of the conversion cannot be represented as a <xref:System.Decimal>.
trans-unit.target: 從不<xref:System.Single>或<xref:System.Double>至<xref:System.Decimal>擲回<xref:System.OverflowException>例外狀況，如果轉換的結果無法表示成<xref:System.Decimal>。

trans-unit.source: Performing Operations on Decimal Values
trans-unit.target: 十進位值上執行的作業

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Decimal> type supports standard mathematical operations such as addition, subtraction, division, multiplication, and unary negation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Decimal>型別支援標準的數學運算，例如加法、 減法、 除法、 乘法和一元否定運算。

trans-unit.source: You can also work directly with the binary representation of a <xref:System.Decimal> value by calling the <xref:System.Decimal.GetBits%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您也可直接使用的二進位表示法<xref:System.Decimal>藉由呼叫值<xref:System.Decimal.GetBits%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To compare two <xref:System.Decimal> values, you can use the standard numeric comparison operators, or you can call the <xref:System.Decimal.CompareTo%2A> or <xref:System.Decimal.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要比較兩個<xref:System.Decimal>值，您可以使用標準數值的比較運算子，或者您可以呼叫<xref:System.Decimal.CompareTo%2A>或<xref:System.Decimal.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also call the members of the <xref:System.Math> class to perform a wide range of numeric operations, including getting the absolute value of a number, determining the maximum or minimum value of two <xref:System.Decimal> values, getting the sign of a number, and rounding a number.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以呼叫的成員<xref:System.Math>類別以執行各種不同的數字的操作，包括取得絕對值的數字，判斷兩個最大或最小值<xref:System.Decimal>取得數字符號和捨入的值數字。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Decimal>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範 <xref:System.Decimal> 的用法。

trans-unit.source: All members of this type are thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 這個型別的所有成員都是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Members that appear to modify instance state actually return a new instance initialized with the new value.
trans-unit.target: 修改執行個體狀態會顯示的成員實際上會傳回新的值初始化的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: As with any other type, reading and writing to a shared variable that contains an instance of this type must be protected by a lock to guarantee thread safety.
trans-unit.target: 做為任何其他類型，以讀取和寫入至共用的變數，其中包含此類型的執行個體必須受到鎖定來保證的執行緒安全。

trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式將`value`来使用四捨五入為最接近的 15 個有效位數。

trans-unit.source: This is done even if the number has more than 15 digits and the less significant digits are zero.
trans-unit.target: 這是即使數目有超過 15 個位數和較少的有效位數是零。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立數個`Decimal`數字使用建構函式多載會初始化`Decimal`結構和<xref:System.Int32>值。

trans-unit.source: An array of 32-bit signed integers containing a representation of a decimal value.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號整數的陣列，包含十進位值的表示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> to a decimal value represented in binary and contained in a specified array.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 的新執行個體初始化為以二進位表示並包含在指定陣列中的十進位值。

trans-unit.source: The binary representation of a <xref:System.Decimal> number consists of a 1-bit sign, a 96-bit integer number, and a scaling factor used to divide the integer number and specify what portion of it is a decimal fraction.
trans-unit.target: 二進位表示法<xref:System.Decimal>數字組成 1 位元符號、 96 位元整數的數字，以及用來除以整數數字，並指定哪些部分是十進位小數的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor is implicitly the number 10, raised to an exponent ranging from 0 to 28.
trans-unit.target: 縮放比例是隱含字 10，範圍從 0 到 28 的指數。

trans-unit.source: `bits` is a four-element long array of 32-bit signed integers.
trans-unit.target: `bits` 是 32 位元帶正負號整數的四個項目長陣列。

trans-unit.source: `bits` [0], `bits` [1], and `bits` [2] contain the low, middle, and high 32 bits of the 96-bit integer number.
trans-unit.target: `bits` [0]、 `bits` [1]，和`bits`[2] 包含 96 位元整數的低度、 中間名和高 32 位元。

trans-unit.source: `bits` [3] contains the scale factor and sign, and consists of following parts:
trans-unit.target: `bits` [3] 包含縮放比例和登入，並由下列部分組成：

trans-unit.source: Bits 0 to 15, the lower word, are unused and must be zero.
trans-unit.target: 位元 0 到 15 之間 facility，未使用，而且必須是零。

trans-unit.source: Bits 16 to 23 must contain an exponent between 0 and 28, which indicates the power of 10 to divide the integer number.
trans-unit.target: 位元 16 到 23 必須包含介於 0 到 28，其指出 10 的次方，除整數數字的指數。

trans-unit.source: Bits 24 to 30 are unused and must be zero.
trans-unit.target: 位元 24 到 30 未使用，而且必須是零。

trans-unit.source: Bit 31 contains the sign; 0 meaning positive, and 1 meaning negative.
trans-unit.target: 31 位元包含符號;0 表示正數且 1 代表負數。

trans-unit.source: A numeric value might have several possible binary representations; all are equally valid and numerically equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 數值可能會有幾個可能的二進位表示法。所有都同樣有效，而且數字相等。

trans-unit.source: Note that the bit representation differentiates between negative and positive zero.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，位元表示區分負數和正數的零。

trans-unit.source: These values are treated as being equal in all operations.
trans-unit.target: 這些值會被視為相等的所有作業中。

trans-unit.source: The binary representation of a <xref:System.Decimal> number consists of a 1-bit sign, a 96-bit integer number, and a scaling factor used to divide the integer number and specify what portion of it is a decimal fraction.
trans-unit.target: 二進位表示法<xref:System.Decimal>數字組成 1 位元符號、 96 位元整數的數字，以及用來除以整數數字，並指定哪些部分是十進位小數的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor is implicitly the number 10 raised to an exponent ranging from 0 to 28.

trans-unit.source: Returns the smallest integral value that is greater than or equal to the specified decimal number.
trans-unit.target: 傳回大於或等於指定之十進位數字的最小整數值。

trans-unit.source: The smallest integral value that is greater than or equal to the <paramref name="d" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 大於或等於 <paramref name="d" /> 參數的最小整數值。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method returns a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> instead of an integral type.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />，而不是整數類型。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method follows IEEE Standard 754, section 4.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的行為遵循 IEEE 標準 754，第 4 節。

trans-unit.source: This kind of rounding is sometimes called rounding toward positive infinity.
trans-unit.target: 這種捨入有時稱為捨入朝向正無限大。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if `d` is positive, the presence of any fractional component causes `d` to be rounded to the next highest integer.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，如果`d`是正數，是否存在任何小數部分原因`d`捨入至下一個最大整數。

trans-unit.source: If `d` is negative, the rounding operation causes any fractional component of `d` to be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果`d`是負數，捨入作業會導致任何小數部分`d`遭到捨棄。

trans-unit.source: The operation of this method differs from the <xref:System.Decimal.Floor%2A> method, which supports rounding toward negative infinity.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的作業不同於<xref:System.Decimal.Floor%2A>方法，支援往負無限大方向捨入。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明<xref:System.Decimal.Ceiling%2A>方法並對照與<xref:System.Decimal.Floor%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method implements the <xref:System.IComparable%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface and performs slightly better than the <xref:System.Decimal.CompareTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method because it does not have to convert the `value` parameter to an object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會實作<xref:System.IComparable%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面並執行稍微優於<xref:System.Decimal.CompareTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法因為並沒有轉換`value`參數物件。

trans-unit.source: Depending on your programming language, it might be possible to code a <xref:System.Decimal.CompareTo%2A> method where the parameter type has fewer bits (is narrower) than the instance type.
trans-unit.target: 根據您的程式語言，可能會以程式碼<xref:System.Decimal.CompareTo%2A>方法的參數型別具有較少的位元的位置 （較窄） 與執行個體類型。

trans-unit.source: This is possible because some programming languages perform an implicit widening conversion that represents the parameter as a type with as many bits as the instance.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是因為有些程式語言會執行隱含擴展轉換，表示參數為型別與相同位元數與執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the instance type is <xref:System.Int32> and the parameter type is <xref:System.Byte>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設執行個體類型是<xref:System.Int32>和參數類型是<xref:System.Byte>。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the parameter as an <xref:System.Int32> object, then generates a <xref:System.Int32.CompareTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to compare the values of the <xref:System.Int32> instance and the <xref:System.Int32> parameter representation.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft C# 編譯器會產生以表示做為參數的指示<xref:System.Int32>物件，然後產生<xref:System.Int32.CompareTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來比較的值<xref:System.Int32>執行個體和<xref:System.Int32>參數表示法。

trans-unit.source: Consult your programming language's documentation to determine whether its compiler performs implicit widening conversions on numeric types.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱您的程式語言的文件，以判斷其編譯器是否數值類型上執行隱含的擴展轉換。

trans-unit.source: This method implements the <xref:System.IEquatable%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface, and performs slightly better than <xref:System.Decimal.Equals%2A> because it does not have to convert the `value` parameter to an object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會實作<xref:System.IEquatable%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面，並執行稍微優於<xref:System.Decimal.Equals%2A>因為並沒有轉換`value`參數物件。

trans-unit.source: If `value` has fewer bits (is narrower) than the instance type, some programming languages perform an implicit widening conversion that transforms the value of the parameter into a value with more bits.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`具有較少的位元 （較窄） 與執行個體類型，有些程式語言會執行隱含的擴展轉換，將參數的值轉換成具有更多的位元的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the instance type is <xref:System.Int32> and the parameter type is <xref:System.Byte>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設執行個體類型是<xref:System.Int32>和參數類型是<xref:System.Byte>。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an <xref:System.Int32> object, then generates a <xref:System.Int32.CompareTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to compare the <xref:System.Int32> instance and parameter representation.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft C# 編譯器會產生代表做為參數的值指示<xref:System.Int32>物件，然後產生<xref:System.Int32.CompareTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來比較<xref:System.Int32>執行個體和參數表示法。

trans-unit.source: Consult your programming language's documentation to determine whether its compiler performs implicit widening conversions on numeric types.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱您的程式語言的文件，以判斷其編譯器是否數值類型上執行隱含的擴展轉換。

trans-unit.source: Compiler overload resolution may account for an apparent difference in the behavior of the two <see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Object)" /> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器的多載解析可能會說明行為中的兩個明顯的差別<see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Object)" />方法多載。

trans-unit.source: If an implicit conversion between the <paramref name="obj" /> argument and a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> is defined and the argument is not typed as an <see cref="T:System.Object" />, compilers may perform an implicit conversion and call the <see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Decimal)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果之間的隱含轉換<paramref name="obj" />引數和<see cref="T:System.Decimal" />定義及引數未當做輸入<see cref="T:System.Object" />，編譯器可能會執行隱含轉換以及呼叫<see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Decimal)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they call the <see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Object)" /> method, which always returns <see langword="false" /> if its <paramref name="obj" /> argument is not a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 否則，呼叫<see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Object)" />方法，它一定會傳回<see langword="false" />如果其<paramref name="obj" />引數不是<see cref="T:System.Decimal" />值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the difference in behavior between the two method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明這兩個方法多載之間的行為差異。

trans-unit.source: In the case of all primitive integral types, including both signed and unsigned types, the first comparison returns <see langword="true" /> because the compiler automatically performs a widening conversion and calls the <see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Decimal)" /> method, whereas the second comparison returns <see langword="false" /> because the compiler calls the <see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在 所有基本的整數類資料類型，包括帶正負號和不帶正負號型別，傳回第一個比較<see langword="true" />因為編譯器會自動執行擴展轉換，並呼叫<see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Decimal)" />方法，而第二個比較傳回<see langword="false" />因為編譯器會呼叫<see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Object)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 與這個執行個體相互比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether this instance and a specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> represent the same type and value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個執行個體和指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 是否表示相同的類型和值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> and equal to this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />，並等於這個執行個體，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example compares several `Decimal` and other objects to a reference `Decimal` value using the `Equals` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會比較數個`Decimal`和其他物件參考`Decimal`值使用`Equals`方法。

trans-unit.source: Compiler overload resolution may account for an apparent difference in the behavior of the two <see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Object)" /> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器的多載解析可能會說明行為中的兩個明顯的差別<see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Object)" />方法多載。

trans-unit.source: If an implicit conversion between the <paramref name="obj" /> argument and a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> is defined and the argument is not typed as an <see cref="T:System.Object" />, compilers may perform an implicit conversion and call the <see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Decimal)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果之間的隱含轉換<paramref name="obj" />引數和<see cref="T:System.Decimal" />定義及引數未當做輸入<see cref="T:System.Object" />，編譯器可能會執行隱含轉換以及呼叫<see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Decimal)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they call the <see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Object)" /> method, which always returns <see langword="false" /> if its <paramref name="obj" /> argument is not a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 否則，呼叫<see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Object)" />方法，它一定會傳回<see langword="false" />如果其<paramref name="obj" />引數不是<see cref="T:System.Decimal" />值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the difference in behavior between the two method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明這兩個方法多載之間的行為差異。

trans-unit.source: In the case of all primitive integral types, including both signed and unsigned types, the first comparison returns <see langword="true" /> because the compiler automatically performs a widening conversion and calls the <see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Decimal)" /> method, whereas the second comparison returns <see langword="false" /> because the compiler calls the <see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在 所有基本的整數類資料類型，包括帶正負號和不帶正負號型別，傳回第一個比較<see langword="true" />因為編譯器會自動執行擴展轉換，並呼叫<see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Decimal)" />方法，而第二個比較傳回<see langword="false" />因為編譯器會呼叫<see cref="M:System.Decimal.Equals(System.Object)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: The first value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個值。

trans-unit.source: The value to round.
trans-unit.target: 要捨入的值。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a specified <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> number to the closest integer toward negative infinity.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 數字往負無限大方向捨入為最接近的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="d" /> has a fractional part, the next whole <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> number toward negative infinity that is less than <paramref name="d" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="d" /> 具有小數部分，則為往負無限大方向，小於 <paramref name="d" /> 的下一個 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 整數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
If <paramref name="d" /> doesn't have a fractional part, <paramref name="d" /> is returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="d" /> 不具有小數部分，則傳回的 <paramref name="d" /> 不變更。

trans-unit.source: Note that the method returns an integral value of type <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 類型的整數值。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method follows IEEE Standard 754, Section 4.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的行為遵循 IEEE 標準 754，第 4 節。

trans-unit.source: This kind of rounding is sometimes called rounding toward negative infinity.
trans-unit.target: 這種捨入有時稱為往負無限大方向捨入。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if `d` is positive, any fractional component is truncated.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，如果`d`是正數，任何小數會截斷。

trans-unit.source: If `d` is negative, the presence of any fractional component causes it to be rounded to the smaller integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果`d`是負數，任何小數的存在可讓它四捨五入到最小的整數。

trans-unit.source: The operation of this method differs from the <xref:System.Decimal.Ceiling%2A> method, which supports rounding toward positive infinity.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的作業不同於<xref:System.Decimal.Ceiling%2A>方法，支援捨入朝向正無限大。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the <xref:System.Decimal.Floor%2A> method and contrasts it with the <xref:System.Decimal.Ceiling%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明<xref:System.Decimal.Floor%2A>方法並對照與<xref:System.Decimal.Ceiling%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要進行轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of a specified instance of <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> to its equivalent binary representation.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 的指定執行個體值轉換為其對等二進位表示。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer array with four elements that contain the binary representation of <paramref name="d" />.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數陣列，具有包含 <paramref name="d" /> 二進位表示的四個項目。

trans-unit.source: The binary representation of a <xref:System.Decimal> number consists of a 1-bit sign, a 96-bit integer number, and a scaling factor used to divide the integer number and specify what portion of it is a decimal fraction.
trans-unit.target: 二進位表示法<xref:System.Decimal>數字組成 1 位元符號、 96 位元整數的數字，以及用來除以整數數字，並指定哪些部分是十進位小數的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor is implicitly the number 10, raised to an exponent ranging from 0 to 28.
trans-unit.target: 縮放比例是隱含字 10，範圍從 0 到 28 的指數。

trans-unit.source: The return value is a four-element array of 32-bit signed integers.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是 32 位元帶正負號整數的四個元素陣列。

trans-unit.source: The first, second, and third elements of the returned array contain the low, middle, and high 32 bits of the 96-bit integer number.
trans-unit.target: 第一、 第二，並傳回陣列中的第三個項目包含 96 位元整數的低度、 中間名和高 32 位元。

trans-unit.source: The fourth element of the returned array contains the scale factor and sign.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列的第四個項目包含縮放比例並登入。

trans-unit.source: It consists of the following parts:
trans-unit.target: 它包含下列部分：

trans-unit.source: Bits 0 to 15, the lower word, are unused and must be zero.
trans-unit.target: 位元 0 到 15 之間 facility，未使用，而且必須是零。

trans-unit.source: Bits 16 to 23 must contain an exponent between 0 and 28, which indicates the power of 10 to divide the integer number.
trans-unit.target: 位元 16 到 23 必須包含介於 0 到 28，其指出 10 的次方，除整數數字的指數。

trans-unit.source: Bits 24 to 30 are unused and must be zero.
trans-unit.target: 位元 24 到 30 未使用，而且必須是零。

trans-unit.source: Bit 31 contains the sign: 0 mean positive, and 1 means negative.
trans-unit.target: 31 位元包含符號： 0 表示正數，和 1 表示負數。

trans-unit.source: Note that the bit representation differentiates between negative and positive zero.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，位元表示區分負數和正數的零。

trans-unit.source: These values are treated as being equal in all operations.
trans-unit.target: 這些值會被視為相等的所有作業中。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `GetBits` method to convert several `Decimal` values to their equivalent binary representations.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用`GetBits`方法，將轉換的數個`Decimal`成其對等二進位表示法的值。

trans-unit.source: It then displays the decimal values and the hexadecimal value of the elements in the array returned by the <xref:System.Decimal.GetBits%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 接著會顯示十進位值和十六進位值的項目中所傳回的陣列<xref:System.Decimal.GetBits%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Decimal.GetBits%2A> method to retrieve the component parts of an array.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Decimal.GetBits%2A>方法來擷取之元件部分的陣列。

trans-unit.source: It then uses this array in the call to the <xref:System.Decimal.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Byte%29> constructor to instantiate a new <xref:System.Decimal> value.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會使用這個陣列中的呼叫<xref:System.Decimal.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Byte%29>建構函式來具現化新<xref:System.Decimal>值。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit unsigned integer that represents the converted <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元不帶正負號的整數，表示已轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />。

trans-unit.source: This operator supports the explicit conversion of a <xref:System.Decimal> to a <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子支援的明確轉換<xref:System.Decimal>至<xref:System.UInt64>。

trans-unit.source: The syntax for such explicit conversions is language-dependent, and individual language compilers can provide different implementations and return different results.
trans-unit.target: 這類明確轉換的語法是語言而異，且個別語言編譯器可提供不同的實作並傳回不同的結果。

trans-unit.source: The example illustrates the different return values when you explicitly convert a <xref:System.Decimal> value to a <xref:System.UInt64> value by using C# and Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 當您明確轉換時，該範例會說明不同的傳回值<xref:System.Decimal>值設定為<xref:System.UInt64>使用 C# 和 Visual Basic 的值。

trans-unit.source: To perform a conversion that is independent of language, you can call the <xref:System.Decimal.ToUInt64%28System.Decimal%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Convert.ToUInt64%28System.Decimal%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行與語言無關的轉換，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Decimal.ToUInt64%28System.Decimal%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Convert.ToUInt64%28System.Decimal%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts <xref:System.Decimal> numbers to <xref:System.UInt64> values by using the explicit <xref:System.Decimal> to <xref:System.UInt64> conversion operator.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Decimal>以數字<xref:System.UInt64>藉由使用明確<xref:System.Decimal>至<xref:System.UInt64>轉換運算子。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 是負值或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt64.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Defines an implicit conversion of the value of a type to a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 定義從某個類型值到 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值的隱含轉換。

trans-unit.source: The overloads of the <xref:System.Decimal.op_Implicit%2A> method define the types from which the compiler can automatically convert a <xref:System.Decimal> value without an explicit casting operator (in C#) or a call to a conversion function (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 多載<xref:System.Decimal.op_Implicit%2A>方法定義從中編譯器可以自動將轉換的型別<xref:System.Decimal>而不需要明確轉型運算子 （C# 中） 或 （在 Visual Basic) 的轉換函式呼叫的值。

trans-unit.source: They are widening conversions that do not involve data loss and do not throw an <xref:System.OverflowException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 它們會擴展轉換不會涉及資料遺失，則不擲回<xref:System.OverflowException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to convert.

trans-unit.target: 它們會擴展轉換不會涉及資料遺失，則不擲回<xref:System.OverflowException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number to its <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將數字的字串表示，轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number to its <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將數字的字串表示，轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent to the number contained in <paramref name="s" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="s" /> 中包含的數字相等的值。

trans-unit.source: Parameter `s` contains a number of the form:
trans-unit.target: 參數`s`包含數字的格式：

trans-unit.source: [ws][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional-digits][ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional-digits][ws]

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每個項目。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *簽署*

trans-unit.source: An optional sign.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的符號。

trans-unit.source: *digits*
trans-unit.target: *digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從 0 到 9 的數字序列。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific thousands separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的千分位分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的小數點符號。

trans-unit.source: *fractional-digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional-digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從 0 到 9 的數字序列。

trans-unit.source: Parameter `s` is interpreted using the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number?displayProperty=nameWithType> style.
trans-unit.target: 參數`s`解譯使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number?displayProperty=nameWithType>樣式。

trans-unit.source: This means that white space and thousands separators are allowed but currency symbols are not.
trans-unit.target: 這表示泛空白字元和千位分隔符號所允許但不是貨幣符號。

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the elements (such as currency symbols, thousands separators, and white space) that can be present in `s`, use either the <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要明確定義的項目 (例如貨幣符號、 千位分隔符號和空白字元) 可以出現在`s`，使用<xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Parameter `s` is parsed using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> initialized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 參數`s`會剖析使用的格式設定資訊中<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>初始化目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To parse a string using the formatting information of some other culture, use the <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要剖析字串，使用其他文化特性格式資訊，請使用<xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If necessary, the value of `s` is rounded using rounding to nearest.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，值`s`會四捨五入為最接近。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Decimal> has 29 digits of precision.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Decimal>具有 29 個位數的有效位數。

trans-unit.source: If `s` represents a number that has more than 29 digits, but has a fractional part and is within the range of <xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue> and <xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>, the number is rounded, not truncated, to 29 digits using rounding to nearest.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`代表有超過 29 個位數，但具有小數部分的範圍內的數字<xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue>和<xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>，數字會四捨五入，不會被截斷，以使用四捨五入為最接近的 29 個位數。

trans-unit.source: If during a parse operation a separator is encountered in the `s` parameter, and the applicable currency or number decimal and group separators are the same, the parse operation assumes that the separator is a decimal separator rather than a group separator.
trans-unit.target: 如果在剖析作業期間出現分隔符號`s`參數，以及適用的貨幣或十進位數字和群組分隔符號是相同的則剖析作業會假設分隔符號是十進位的分隔符號，而不是群組分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: For more information about separators, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>, and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>，和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%29> method to parse string representations of <xref:System.Decimal> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%29>方法來剖析的字串表示法<xref:System.Decimal>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is not in the correct format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 的格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> represents a number less than <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 表示小於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberStyles" /> values that indicates the style elements that can be present in <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberStyles" /> 值的位元組合，表示可出現在 <c>s</c> 中的樣式項目。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number" />.
trans-unit.target: 一般會指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified style to its <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將指定樣式中數字的字串表示轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> number equivalent to the number contained in <paramref name="s" /> as specified by <paramref name="style" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 數字，等於包含在 <paramref name="s" /> 中的數字，如同 <paramref name="style" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: The `style` parameter defines the style elements (such as thousands separators, white space, and currency symbols) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed.
trans-unit.target: `style`參數定義的樣式項目 (例如千位分隔符號、 空格和貨幣符號) 中允許`s`剖析作業成功的參數。

trans-unit.source: It must be a combination of bit flags from the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 它必須從位元旗標的組合<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members are not supported:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>不支援的成員：

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of `style`, the `s` parameter may include the following elements:
trans-unit.target: 值而定`style`、`s`參數可以包含下列項目：

trans-unit.source: [ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional-digits][e[sign]digits][ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional-digits][e[sign]digits][ws]

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每個項目。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, and it can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 空白字元可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，而且可以出現在結尾`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific currency symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的貨幣符號。

trans-unit.source: Its position in the string is defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 在字串中的位置由定義<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>目前文化特性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The current culture's currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 目前文化特性的貨幣符號可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *簽署*

trans-unit.source: An optional sign.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的符號。

trans-unit.source: The sign can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, and it can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 符號可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，而且可以出現在結尾`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: Parentheses can be used in `s` to indicate a negative value if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowParentheses?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 括號可用於`s`來表示負數的值，如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowParentheses?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *digits*
trans-unit.target: *digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從 0 到 9 的數字序列。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific thousands separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的千分位分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: The current culture's thousands separator can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 目前文化特性的千分位分隔符號可出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的小數點符號。

trans-unit.source: The current culture's decimal point symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 目前的文化特性小數點符號可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *fractional-digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional-digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從 0 到 9 的數字序列。

trans-unit.source: Fractional digits can appear in `s` only if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 小數點後數字才會出現在`s`才`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: The 'e' or 'E' character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: 'E' 或者 'E' 字元，表示此值會以指數標記法表示。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數可代表指數標記法之數字，如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: A string with digits only (which corresponds to the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None> style) always parses successfully.
trans-unit.target: 只有數字的字串 (對應於<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None>樣式) 一律會成功剖析。

trans-unit.source: The remaining <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members control elements that may be but are not required to be present in the input string.
trans-unit.target: 其餘<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>成員控制可能，但是不一定要在輸入字串中出現的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates how individual <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members affect the elements that may be present in `s`.
trans-unit.target: 下表指出如何個別<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>成員會影響的項目可能會出現在`s`。

trans-unit.source: NumberStyles value
trans-unit.target: NumberStyles 值

trans-unit.source: Elements permitted in s in addition to digits
trans-unit.target: 允許 s 除了數字中的項目

trans-unit.source: The *digits* element only.
trans-unit.target: *位數*只有項目。

trans-unit.source: The *.*
and *fractional-digits* elements.

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數也可以使用指數標記法。

trans-unit.source: This flag supports values in the form *digits*E*digits*; additional flags are needed to successfully parse strings with elements such as positive or negative signs and decimal point symbols.
trans-unit.target: 這個旗標的形式支援值*位數*E*位數*; 其他旗標才能成功剖析項目，例如正負號和小數點符號的字串。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*開頭的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*結尾處的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *sign* element at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *登*開頭的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *sign* element at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *登*結尾處的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *sign* element in the form of parentheses enclosing the numeric value.
trans-unit.target: *登*括住的數字值的形式的項目。

trans-unit.source: The *,* element.
The *$* element.
All.
trans-unit.target: 全部。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter cannot represent a hexadecimal number or a number in exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數無法表示的十六進位數字或指數標記法之數字。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the beginning or end of `s`, *sign* at the beginning of `s`, and the *.*
trans-unit.target: *Ws*開頭或結尾的項目`s`，*登*開頭`s`，而*。*

trans-unit.source: symbol.
trans-unit.target: 符號。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數也可以使用指數標記法。

trans-unit.source: The `ws`, `sign`, *,*, and *.*
elements.
trans-unit.target: 項目。

trans-unit.source: All styles, except `s` cannot represent a hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: 所有的樣式，除了`s`無法表示的十六進位數字。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object initialized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數會剖析使用的格式設定資訊中<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件初始化為目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Decimal> has 29 digits of precision.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Decimal>具有 29 個位數的有效位數。

trans-unit.source: If `s` represents a number that has more than 29 digits, but has a fractional part and is within the range of <xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue> and <xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>, the number is rounded, not truncated, to 29 digits using rounding to nearest.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`代表有超過 29 個位數，但具有小數部分的範圍內的數字<xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue>和<xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>，數字會四捨五入，不會被截斷，以使用四捨五入為最接近的 29 個位數。

trans-unit.source: If a separator is encountered in the `s` parameter during a parse operation, `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> values, and the applicable currency or number decimal and group separators are the same, the parse operation assumes that the separator is a decimal separator rather than a group separator.
trans-unit.target: 如果發現中分隔符號`s`參數在剖析作業期間`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>值，適用於貨幣或十進位數字和群組分隔符號是相同的剖析作業假設分隔符號是十進位的分隔符號，而不是群組分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: For more information about separators, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>, and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>，和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29> method to parse the string representations of <xref:System.Decimal> values using the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29>方法來剖析的字串表示<xref:System.Decimal>使用 EN-US 文化特性值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.

<paramref name="style" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier" /> value.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 表示小於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" /> 的數字

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> that supplies culture-specific parsing information about <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" />，提供關於 <c>s</c> 的文化特性特定剖析資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number to its <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> equivalent using the specified culture-specific format information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的特定文化特性格式資訊，將數字的字串表示轉換為其對等的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> number equivalent to the number contained in <paramref name="s" /> as specified by <paramref name="provider" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 數字，等於包含在 <paramref name="s" /> 中的數字，如同 <paramref name="provider" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method is commonly used to convert text that can be formatted in a variety of ways to a <xref:System.Decimal> value.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載<xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法通常用來將各種不同的方式來格式化的文字轉換<xref:System.Decimal>值。

trans-unit.source: For example, it can be used to convert the text entered by a user into an HTML text box to a numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它可以用來將由使用者 HTML 文字方塊中輸入數值的文字轉換。

trans-unit.target: [ws][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional-digits][ws]

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每個項目。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *簽署*

trans-unit.source: An optional sign.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的符號。

trans-unit.source: *digits*
trans-unit.target: *digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從 0 到 9 的數字序列。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific thousands separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的千分位分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的小數點符號。

trans-unit.source: *fractional-digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional-digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
