trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is interpreted using the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number?displayProperty=nameWithType> style.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數會使用解譯<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number?displayProperty=nameWithType>樣式。

trans-unit.source: This means that white space and thousands separators are allowed but currency symbols are not.
trans-unit.target: 這表示泛空白字元和千位分隔符號所允許但不是貨幣符號。

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the elements (such as currency symbols, thousands separators, and white space) that can be present in `s`, use the <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要明確定義的項目 (例如貨幣符號、 千位分隔符號和空白字元) 可以出現在`s`，使用<xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation, such as a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> or <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>實作，例如<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter supplies culture-specific information used in parsing.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數提供用於剖析的特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the thread current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `provider` 是 `null`，則會使用執行緒目前的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Decimal> object has 29 digits of precision.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Decimal>物件具有 29 個位數的有效位數。

trans-unit.source: If `s` represents a number that has more than 29 digits, but has a fractional part and is within the range of <xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue> and <xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>, the number is rounded, not truncated, to 29 digits using rounding to nearest.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`代表有超過 29 個位數，但具有小數部分的範圍內的數字<xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue>和<xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>，數字會四捨五入，不會被截斷，以使用四捨五入為最接近的 29 個位數。

trans-unit.source: If a separator is encountered in the `s` parameter during a parse operation, and the applicable currency or number decimal and group separators are the same, the parse operation assumes that the separator is a decimal separator rather than a group separator.
trans-unit.target: 如果發現中分隔符號`s`期間剖析作業，以及適用的貨幣或十進位數的參數和群組分隔符號都相同，剖析作業會假設分隔符號是十進位的分隔符號，而不是群組分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: For more information about separators, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>, and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>，和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example is the button click event handler of a Web form.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是按鈕 click 事件處理常式的 Web 表單。

trans-unit.source: It uses the array returned by the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.UserLanguages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the user's locale.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用所傳回的陣列<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.UserLanguages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來判斷使用者的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: It then instantiates a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to that locale.
trans-unit.target: 它接著會執行個體化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>對應至該地區設定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that belongs to that <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object is then passed to the <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method to convert the user's input to a <xref:System.Decimal> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>所屬的物件<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件隨後會傳遞至<xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法，將使用者轉換的輸入來<xref:System.Decimal>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is not of the correct format
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 不屬於正確的格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> represents a number less than <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 表示小於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" /> 的數字

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberStyles" /> values that indicates the style elements that can be present in <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberStyles" /> 值的位元組合，表示可出現在 <c>s</c> 中的樣式項目。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number" />.
trans-unit.target: 一般會指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> object that supplies culture-specific information about the format of <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> 物件，提供關於 <c>s</c> 格式的文化特性特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number to its <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> equivalent using the specified style and culture-specific format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的樣式和特定文化特性格式，將數字的字串表示轉換為其對等的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> number equivalent to the number contained in <paramref name="s" /> as specified by <paramref name="style" /> and <paramref name="provider" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 數字，等於包含在 <paramref name="s" /> 中的數字，如同 <paramref name="style" /> 和 <paramref name="provider" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: The `style` parameter defines the allowable format of the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed.
trans-unit.target: `style`參數定義的允許格式`s`剖析作業成功的參數。

trans-unit.source: It must be a combination of bit flags from the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 它必須從位元旗標的組合<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members are not supported:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>不支援的成員：

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of `style`, the `s` parameter may include the following elements:
trans-unit.target: 值而定`style`、`s`參數可以包含下列項目：

trans-unit.source: [ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional-digits][e[sign]digits][ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional-digits][e[sign]digits][ws]

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每個項目。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific currency symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的貨幣符號。

trans-unit.source: Its position in the string is defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method of the `provider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在字串中的位置由定義<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A>屬性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>所傳回物件<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法`provider`參數。

trans-unit.source: The currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 貨幣符號可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, and it can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 空白字元可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，而且可以出現在結尾`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *簽署*

trans-unit.source: An optional sign.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的符號。

trans-unit.source: The sign can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, and it can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 符號可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，而且可以出現在結尾`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: Parentheses can be used in `s` to indicate a negative value if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowParentheses?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 括號可用於`s`來表示負數的值，如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowParentheses?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *digits*
trans-unit.target: *digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從 0 到 9 的數字序列。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific thousands separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的千分位分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: The thousands separator of the culture defined by `provider` can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 千分位分隔符號所定義的文化特性`provider`可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的小數點符號。

trans-unit.source: The decimal point symbol of the culture defined by `provider` can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 文化特性所定義的小數點符號`provider`可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *fractional-digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional-digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從 0 到 9 的數字序列。

trans-unit.source: Fractional digits can appear in `s` only if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 小數點後數字才會出現在`s`才`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: The 'e' or 'E' character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: 'E' 或者 'E' 字元，表示此值會以指數標記法表示。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數可代表指數標記法之數字，如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: A string with digits only (which corresponds to the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None> style) always parses successfully.
trans-unit.target: 只有數字的字串 (對應於<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None>樣式) 一律會成功剖析。

trans-unit.source: The remaining <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members control elements that may be but are not required to be present in the input string.
trans-unit.target: 其餘<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>成員控制可能，但是不一定要在輸入字串中出現的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates how individual <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members affect the elements that may be present in `s`.
trans-unit.target: 下表指出如何個別<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>成員會影響的項目可能會出現在`s`。

trans-unit.source: NumberStyles value
trans-unit.target: NumberStyles 值

trans-unit.source: Elements permitted in s in addition to digits
trans-unit.target: 允許 s 除了數字中的項目

trans-unit.source: The *digits* element only.
trans-unit.target: *位數*只有項目。

trans-unit.source: The *.*
and *fractional-digits* elements.
trans-unit.target: 和*小數點後數字*項目。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數也可以使用指數標記法。

trans-unit.source: This flag supports values in the form *digits*E*digits*; additional flags are needed to successfully parse strings with elements such as positive or negative signs and decimal point symbols.
trans-unit.target: 這個旗標的形式支援值*位數*E*位數*; 其他旗標才能成功剖析項目，例如正負號和小數點符號的字串。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*開頭的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*結尾處的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *sign* element at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *登*開頭的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *sign* element at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *登*結尾處的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *sign* element in the form of parentheses enclosing the numeric value.
trans-unit.target: *登*括住的數字值的形式的項目。

trans-unit.source: The *,* element.
The *$* element.
All.
trans-unit.target: 全部。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter cannot represent a hexadecimal number or a number in exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數無法表示的十六進位數字或指數標記法之數字。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the beginning or end of `s`, *sign* at the beginning of `s`, and the *.*symbol.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*開頭或結尾的項目`s`，*登*開頭`s`，而*。*符號。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數也可以使用指數標記法。

trans-unit.source: The `ws`, `sign`, *,*, and *.*
elements.
trans-unit.target: 項目。

trans-unit.source: All styles, except `s` cannot represent a hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: 所有的樣式，除了`s`無法表示的十六進位數字。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation, such as a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> or <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>實作，例如<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter supplies culture-specific information used in parsing.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數提供用於剖析的特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the thread current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `provider` 是 `null`，則會使用執行緒目前的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Decimal> object has 29 digits of precision.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Decimal>物件具有 29 個位數的有效位數。

trans-unit.source: If `s` represents a number that has more than 29 digits, but has a fractional part and is within the range of <xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue> and <xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>, the number is rounded, not truncated, to 29 digits using rounding to nearest.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`代表有超過 29 個位數，但具有小數部分的範圍內的數字<xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue>和<xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>，數字會四捨五入，不會被截斷，以使用四捨五入為最接近的 29 個位數。

trans-unit.source: If a separator is encountered in the `s` parameter during a parse operation, and the applicable currency or number decimal and group separators are the same, the parse operation assumes that the separator is a decimal separator rather than a group separator.
trans-unit.target: 如果發現中分隔符號`s`期間剖析作業，以及適用的貨幣或十進位數的參數和群組分隔符號都相同，剖析作業會假設分隔符號是十進位的分隔符號，而不是群組分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: For more information about separators, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>, and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>，和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a variety of `style` and `provider` parameters to parse the string representations of <xref:System.Decimal> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用各種`style`和`provider`剖析的字串表示的參數<xref:System.Decimal>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is not in the correct format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 的格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> represents a number less than <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 表示小於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="style" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberStyles" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="style" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="style" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="style" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The dividend.
trans-unit.target: 被除數。

trans-unit.source: The divisor.
trans-unit.target: 除數。

trans-unit.source: Computes the remainder after dividing two <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 計算將兩個 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值相除後的餘數。

trans-unit.source: The remainder after dividing <paramref name="d1" /> by <paramref name="d2" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d1" /> 除以 <paramref name="d2" /> 後的餘數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Decimal.Remainder%2A> method to calculate the remainder in a series of division operations.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Decimal.Remainder%2A>方法來計算中一連串的除法運算的餘數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="d2" /> is zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d2" /> 為零。

trans-unit.source: The return value is less than <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值小於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a value to the nearest integer or specified number of decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 將值捨入至最接近的整數或是指定的小數位數數字。

trans-unit.source: A decimal number to round.
trans-unit.target: 要捨入的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a decimal value to the nearest integer.
trans-unit.target: 將十進位值四捨五入為最接近的整數。

trans-unit.source: The integer that is nearest to the <paramref name="d" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 最接近 <paramref name="d" /> 參數的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="d" /> is halfway between two integers, one of which is even and the other odd, the even number is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="d" /> 介於兩個整數中間，一個為偶數，一個為奇數，則會傳回偶數。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method follows IEEE Standard 754, section 4.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的行為遵循 IEEE 標準 754，第 4 節。

trans-unit.source: This kind of rounding is sometimes called *round half to even* or *banker's rounding*.
trans-unit.target: 這種捨入亦稱為*四捨五入一半甚至*或*銀行進位*。

trans-unit.source: It minimizes rounding errors that result from consistently rounding a midpoint value in a single direction.
trans-unit.target: 它會將一致四捨五入單向中中間的四捨五入錯誤降至最低。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Decimal.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29> method with a `mode` argument of <xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於呼叫<xref:System.Decimal.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29>方法`mode`引數的<xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example rounds a range of <xref:System.Decimal> values between 100 and 102 to the nearest integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將一連串<xref:System.Decimal>介於 100 到 102 為最接近整數的值。

trans-unit.source: Because the method uses banker's rounding, note that 100.5 rounds to 100 and 101.5 rounds to 102.
trans-unit.target: 因為此方法會使用成雙，請注意，100.5 捨入至 100 和 101.5 會四捨五入至 102。

trans-unit.source: The result is outside the range of a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 結果超出 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值的範圍。

trans-unit.source: A decimal number to round.
trans-unit.target: 要捨入的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: A value from 0 to 28 that specifies the number of decimal places to round to.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 28 的值，這個值指定要捨入到的小數位數。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> value to a specified number of decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值捨入為指定的小數位數。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number equivalent to <paramref name="d" /> rounded to <paramref name="decimals" /> number of decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 十進位數字，等於捨入為 <paramref name="decimals" /> 小數位數的 <paramref name="d" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Decimal.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29> method with a `mode` argument of <xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven?displayProperty=nameWithType>.When `d` is exactly halfway between two rounded values, the result is the rounded value that has an even digit in the far right decimal position.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於呼叫<xref:System.Decimal.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29>方法`mode`引數的<xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven?displayProperty=nameWithType>。當`d`正中間時兩個捨入值，結果會捨入的小數點右邊有偶數的數字的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, when rounded to two decimals, the value 2.345 becomes 2.34 and the value 2.355 becomes 2.36.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在四捨五入為兩個小數位數時，值 2.345 會變成 2.34，而值 2.355 會變成 2.36。

trans-unit.source: This process is known as *rounding toward even*, or *banker's rounding*.
trans-unit.target: 這個程序稱為*傾向偶數捨*，或*銀行進位*。

trans-unit.source: It minimizes rounding errors that result from consistently rounding a midpoint value in a single direction.
trans-unit.target: 它會將一致四捨五入單向中中間的四捨五入錯誤降至最低。

trans-unit.source: The following example rounds several `Decimal` values to a specified number of decimal places using the `Round` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將數個`Decimal`值使用的小數位數的指定數目`Round`方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="decimals" /> is not a value from 0 to 28.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="decimals" /> 不是從 0 到 28 的值。

trans-unit.source: A decimal number to round.
trans-unit.target: 要捨入的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies how to round <c>d</c> if it is midway between two other numbers.
trans-unit.target: 此值指定當 <c>d</c> 介於另外兩個數字中間時的捨入法。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a decimal value to the nearest integer.
trans-unit.target: 將十進位值四捨五入為最接近的整數。

trans-unit.source: A parameter specifies how to round the value if it is midway between two other numbers.
trans-unit.target: 如果值介於兩個其他數字之間，參數會指定如何捨入該值。

trans-unit.source: The integer that is nearest to the <paramref name="d" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 最接近 <paramref name="d" /> 參數的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="d" /> is halfway between two numbers, one of which is even and the other odd, the <paramref name="mode" /> parameter determines which of the two numbers is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="d" /> 在兩個數字的中間 (一個為偶數，另一個為奇數)，<paramref name="mode" /> 參數會判斷要傳回兩個數字中的哪一個。

trans-unit.source: In a midpoint value, the value after the least significant digit in the result is precisely half way between two numbers.
trans-unit.target: 在的中點值，結果中的最小顯著性數字後的值會是精確之間的一半兩個數字。

trans-unit.source: For example, 7.5 is a midpoint value if it is to be rounded to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，7.5 中點值。 如果捨入到整數

trans-unit.source: For midpoint values, the nearest value can't be easily identified without a rounding convention, which is specified by the `mode` argument.
trans-unit.target: 中間值的最接近的值無法輕鬆地識別沒有捨入的慣例，由所指定`mode`引數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Decimal.Round%2A> method supports two rounding conventions for handling midpoint values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Decimal.Round%2A>方法支援兩種捨入慣例來處理中點值。

trans-unit.source: Rounding away from zero.
trans-unit.target: 背離零四捨五入。

trans-unit.source: Midpoint values are rounded to the next number away from zero.
trans-unit.target: 中間點的值會捨去遠離零的下一個編號。

trans-unit.source: For example, 3.5 rounds to 4, 4.5 rounds to 5, -3.5 rounds to -4, and -4.5 rounds to -5.
trans-unit.target: 例如，3.5 會進位為 4，5 4.5 則四捨五入，-3.5 捨入為-4，和-4.5 捨入至-5。

trans-unit.source: This form of rounding is represented by the <xref:System.MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: 這種形式的捨入由<xref:System.MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero?displayProperty=nameWithType>列舉成員。

trans-unit.source: Rounding away from zero is the most widely known form of rounding.
trans-unit.target: 背離零四捨五入是最廣泛已知的形式的捨入。

trans-unit.source: Rounding to even, or banker's rounding
trans-unit.target: 捨入為偶數，或成雙

trans-unit.source: Midpoint values are rounded to the nearest even number.
trans-unit.target: 中間值會四捨五入至最接近的偶數。

trans-unit.source: For example, both 3.5 and 4.5 round to 4, and both -3.5 and -4.5 round to -4.
trans-unit.target: 例如，捨入為 4，3.5 和 4.5，與-3.5 和-4.5 則四捨五入到-4。

trans-unit.source: This form of rounding is represented by the <xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: 這種形式的捨入由<xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven?displayProperty=nameWithType>列舉成員。

trans-unit.source: Rounding to nearest is the standard form of rounding used in financial and statistical operations.
trans-unit.target: 四捨五入為最接近是捨入財務和統計作業中使用的標準形式。

trans-unit.source: It conforms to IEEE Standard 754, section 4.
trans-unit.target: 其符合標準 ieee-754，第 4 節。

trans-unit.source: When used in multiple rounding operations, it reduces the rounding error that is caused by consistently rounding midpoint values in a single direction.
trans-unit.target: 多個的捨入運算中使用時，它會減少因一致四捨五入單向中的點值捨入錯誤。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, this rounding error can be significant.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，此捨入錯誤可能十分顯著。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays values returned by the <xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Decimal%29> method, the <xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29> method with a `mode` argument of <xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven>, and the <xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29> method with a `mode` argument of <xref:System.MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示傳回的值<xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Decimal%29>方法，<xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29>方法`mode`引數的<xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven>，而<xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29>方法`mode`引數的<xref:System.MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mode" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.MidpointRounding" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mode" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.MidpointRounding" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The result is outside the range of a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 結果位於 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 物件的範圍之外。

trans-unit.source: A decimal number to round.
trans-unit.target: 要捨入的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: The number of significant decimal places (precision) in the return value.
trans-unit.target: 在傳回值中的有效小數位數 (精確度)。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies how to round <c>d</c> if it is midway between two other numbers.
trans-unit.target: 此值指定當 <c>d</c> 介於另外兩個數字中間時的捨入法。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a decimal value to a specified precision.
trans-unit.target: 將十進位的值捨入至指定的精確度。

trans-unit.source: A parameter specifies how to round the value if it is midway between two other numbers.
trans-unit.target: 如果值介於兩個其他數字之間，參數會指定如何捨入該值。

trans-unit.source: The number that is nearest to the <paramref name="d" /> parameter with a precision equal to the <paramref name="decimals" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 最接近 <paramref name="d" /> 參數的數字，有效位數等於 <paramref name="decimals" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="d" /> is halfway between two numbers, one of which is even and the other odd, the <paramref name="mode" /> parameter determines which of the two numbers is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="d" /> 在兩個數字的中間 (一個為偶數，另一個為奇數)，<paramref name="mode" /> 參數會判斷要傳回兩個數字中的哪一個。

trans-unit.source: If the precision of <paramref name="d" /> is less than <paramref name="decimals" />, <paramref name="d" /> is returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="d" /> 的精確度少於 <paramref name="decimals" />，則 <paramref name="d" /> 傳回時不會變更。

trans-unit.source: The `decimals` parameter specifies the number of significant decimal places in the return value and ranges from 0 to 28.
trans-unit.target: `decimals`參數傳回的值中指定的有效小數位數，範圍從 0 到 28。

trans-unit.source: If `decimals` is zero, an integer is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`decimals`為零，則會傳回一個整數。

trans-unit.source: In a midpoint value, the value after the least significant digit in the result is precisely half way between two numbers.
trans-unit.target: 在的中點值，結果中的最小顯著性數字後的值會是精確之間的一半兩個數字。

trans-unit.source: For example, 3.47500 is a midpoint value if it is to be rounded two decimal places, and 7.500 is a midpoint value if it is to be rounded to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，3.47500 是中間值，如果要進位的兩個小數位數，而且 7.500 是中間值，如果是要四捨五入成整數。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the nearest value can't be easily identified without a rounding convention, which is specified by the `mode` argument.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，最接近的值無法輕鬆地識別沒有捨入的慣例，由指定`mode`引數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Decimal.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29> method supports two rounding conventions for handling midpoint values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Decimal.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29>方法支援兩種捨入慣例來處理中點值。

trans-unit.source: Rounding away from zero.
trans-unit.target: 背離零四捨五入。

trans-unit.source: Midpoint values are rounded to the next number away from zero.
trans-unit.target: 中間點的值會捨去遠離零的下一個編號。

trans-unit.source: For example, 3.75 rounds to 3.8, 3.85 rounds to 3.9, -3.75 rounds to -3.8, and -3.85 rounds to -3.9.
This form of rounding is represented by the <xref:System.MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: 這種形式的捨入由<xref:System.MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero?displayProperty=nameWithType>列舉成員。

trans-unit.source: Rounding away from zero is the most widely known form of rounding.
trans-unit.target: 背離零四捨五入是最廣泛已知的形式的捨入。

trans-unit.source: Rounding to even, or banker's rounding
trans-unit.target: 捨入為偶數，或成雙

trans-unit.source: Midpoint values are rounded to the nearest even number.
trans-unit.target: 中間值會四捨五入至最接近的偶數。

trans-unit.source: For example, both 3.75 and 3.85 round to 3.8, and both -3.75 and -3.85 round to -3.8.
This form of rounding is represented by the <xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: 這種形式的捨入由<xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven?displayProperty=nameWithType>列舉成員。

trans-unit.source: Rounding to nearest is the standard form of rounding used in financial and statistical operations.
trans-unit.target: 四捨五入為最接近是捨入財務和統計作業中使用的標準形式。

trans-unit.source: It conforms to IEEE Standard 754, section 4.
trans-unit.target: 其符合標準 ieee-754，第 4 節。

trans-unit.source: When used in multiple rounding operations, it reduces the rounding error that is caused by consistently rounding midpoint values in a single direction.
trans-unit.target: 多個的捨入運算中使用時，它會減少因一致四捨五入單向中的點值捨入錯誤。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, this rounding error can be significant.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，此捨入錯誤可能十分顯著。

trans-unit.source: The object that initiated the callback.
trans-unit.target: 初始化回呼 (Callback) 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The functionality for this parameter is not currently implemented.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數的功能目前未實作。

trans-unit.source: Runs when the deserialization of an object has been completed.
trans-unit.target: 在物件完成還原序列化時執行。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> object contains invalid or corrupted data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 物件包含無效或損毀的資料。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> to the equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值轉換為對等的 8 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit unsigned integer equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數，等於 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: Parameter `value` is rounded to the nearest integer value toward zero, and that result is returned.
trans-unit.target: 參數`value`四捨五入為最接近的整數值趨近於零，而且結果會傳回。

trans-unit.source: You can also convert a <xref:System.Decimal> value to an 8-bit unsigned integer by using the <xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A> assignment operator.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以轉換<xref:System.Decimal>使用 8 位元不帶正負號整數的值<xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A>指派運算子。

trans-unit.source: Because the operator performs a narrowing conversion, you must use a casting operator in C# or a conversion function in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 運算子執行縮小轉換，因為您必須使用轉型運算子，在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的轉換函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Decimal.ToByte%2A> method to convert decimal numbers to <xref:System.Byte> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Decimal.ToByte%2A>方法，將轉換的十進位數字<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 小於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> to the equivalent double-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值轉換為對等的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number equivalent to <paramref name="d" />.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數，等於 <paramref name="d" />。

trans-unit.source: This operation can produce round-off errors because a double-precision floating-point number has fewer significant digits than a <xref:System.Decimal>.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業可以產生捨入錯誤，因為雙精確度浮點數具有較少的有效位數比<xref:System.Decimal>。

trans-unit.source: You can also convert a <xref:System.Decimal> to a <xref:System.Double> value by using the <xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A> assignment operator.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以轉換<xref:System.Decimal>至<xref:System.Double>值使用<xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A>指派運算子。

trans-unit.source: Because the conversion can entail a loss of precision, you must use a casting operator in C# or a conversion function in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 因為轉換可以發生失去有效位數，您必須使用轉型運算子，在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的轉換函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts `Decimal` numbers to <xref:System.Double> values using `ToDouble` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將`Decimal`以數字<xref:System.Double>使用值`ToDouble`方法。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> to the equivalent 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值轉換為對等的 16 位元帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit signed integer equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 16 位元帶正負號的整數，等於 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: You can also convert a <xref:System.Decimal> value to a 16-bit integer by using the <xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A> assignment operator.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以轉換<xref:System.Decimal>要使用的 16 位元的整數值<xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A>指派運算子。

trans-unit.source: Because the operator performs a narrowing conversion, you must use a casting operator in C# or a conversion function in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 運算子執行縮小轉換，因為您必須使用轉型運算子，在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的轉換函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Decimal.ToInt16%2A> method to convert decimal numbers to <xref:System.Int16> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Decimal.ToInt16%2A>方法，將轉換的十進位數字<xref:System.Int16>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 小於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> to the equivalent 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值轉換為對等的 32 位元帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer equivalent to the value of <paramref name="d" />.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數，等於 <paramref name="d" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the integral part of the decimal value; fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是值的十進位; 不可或缺的一部分小數點後數字會被截斷。

trans-unit.source: You can also convert a <xref:System.Decimal> value to a 32-bit integer by using the <xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A> assignment operator.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以轉換<xref:System.Decimal>使用 32 位元整數的值<xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A>指派運算子。

trans-unit.source: Because the operator performs a narrowing conversion, you must use a casting operator in C# or a conversion function in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 運算子執行縮小轉換，因為您必須使用轉型運算子，在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的轉換函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Decimal.ToInt32%2A> method to convert decimal numbers to <xref:System.Int32> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Decimal.ToInt32%2A>方法，將轉換的十進位數字<xref:System.Int32>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="d" /> is less than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> 小於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> to the equivalent 64-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值轉換為對等的 64 位元帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit signed integer equivalent to the value of <paramref name="d" />.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元帶正負號的整數，等於 <paramref name="d" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the integral part of the decimal value; fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是值的十進位; 不可或缺的一部分小數點後數字會被截斷。

trans-unit.source: You can also convert a <xref:System.Decimal> value to a 64-bit integer by using the <xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A> assignment operator.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以轉換<xref:System.Decimal>要使用 64 位元整數值<xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A>指派運算子。

trans-unit.source: Because the operator performs a narrowing conversion, you must use a casting operator in C# or a conversion function in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 運算子執行縮小轉換，因為您必須使用轉型運算子，在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的轉換函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Decimal.ToInt64%2A> method to convert decimal numbers to <xref:System.Int64> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Decimal.ToInt64%2A>方法，將轉換的十進位數字<xref:System.Int64>值。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> 小於 <see cref="F:System.Int64.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int64.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值轉換為對等的 OLE Automation 貨幣值，這個值包含在 64 位元帶正負號的整數中。

trans-unit.source: Because the operator performs a narrowing conversion, you must use a casting operator in C# or a conversion function in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 運算子執行縮小轉換，因為您必須使用轉型運算子，在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的轉換函式。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> to the equivalent single-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值轉換為對等的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point number equivalent to the value of <paramref name="d" />.
trans-unit.target: 單精確度浮點數，等於 <paramref name="d" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: This operation can produce round-off errors because a single-precision floating-point number has fewer significant digits than a <xref:System.Decimal>.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業可以產生捨入錯誤，因為單精確度浮點數具有較少的有效位數比<xref:System.Decimal>。

trans-unit.source: You can also convert a <xref:System.Decimal> to a <xref:System.Single> value by using the <xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A> assignment operator.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以轉換<xref:System.Decimal>至<xref:System.Single>值使用<xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A>指派運算子。

trans-unit.source: Because the conversion can entail a loss of precision, you must use a casting operator in C# or a conversion function in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 因為轉換可以發生失去有效位數，您必須使用轉型運算子，在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的轉換函式。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation whose <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>實作其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會傳回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, `provider` is a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object or a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，`provider`是<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter supplies culture-specific information used in formatting.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數提供特定文化特性的格式化使用的資訊。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the thread current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `provider` 是 `null`，則會使用執行緒目前的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter can be any valid [standard numeric format specifier](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) except for D, R, and X, as well as any combination of [custom numeric format specifiers](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).

trans-unit.target: 如果`format`是`null`或空字串，傳回這個執行個體的值會格式化為具有一般數值格式規範 (G)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation whose <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>實作其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會傳回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, `provider` is a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> or <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，`provider`是<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter supplies culture-specific information used in formatting.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數提供特定文化特性的格式化使用的資訊。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the thread current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `provider` 是 `null`，則會使用執行緒目前的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays a <xref:System.Decimal> value using each of the supported standard numeric format specifiers for several different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示<xref:System.Decimal>值使用每個支援標準數值格式規範的數個不同的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="format" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> to the equivalent 16-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值轉換為對等的 16 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit unsigned integer equivalent to the value of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 16 位元不帶正負號的整數，等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the integral part of the decimal value; fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是值的十進位; 不可或缺的一部分小數點後數字會被截斷。

trans-unit.source: You can also convert a <xref:System.Decimal> value to a 16-bit unsigned integer by using the <xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A> assignment operator.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以轉換<xref:System.Decimal>要使用的 16 位元不帶正負號整數值<xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A>指派運算子。

trans-unit.source: Because the operator performs a narrowing conversion, you must use a casting operator in C# or a conversion function in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 運算子執行縮小轉換，因為您必須使用轉型運算子，在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的轉換函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Decimal.ToUInt16%2A> method to convert decimal numbers to <xref:System.UInt16> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Decimal.ToUInt16%2A>方法，將轉換的十進位數字<xref:System.UInt16>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> to the equivalent 32-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值轉換為對等的 32 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit unsigned integer equivalent to the value of <paramref name="d" />.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元不帶正負號的整數，等於 <paramref name="d" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the integral part of the decimal value; fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是值的十進位; 不可或缺的一部分小數點後數字會被截斷。

trans-unit.source: You can also convert a <xref:System.Decimal> value to an 32-bit unsigned integer by using the <xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A> assignment operator.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以轉換<xref:System.Decimal>使用 32 位元不帶正負號整數的值<xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A>指派運算子。

trans-unit.source: Because the operator performs a narrowing conversion, you must use a casting operator in C# or a conversion function in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 運算子執行縮小轉換，因為您必須使用轉型運算子，在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的轉換函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Decimal.ToUInt32%2A> method to convert decimal numbers to <xref:System.UInt32> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Decimal.ToUInt32%2A>方法，將轉換的十進位數字<xref:System.UInt32>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="d" /> is negative or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> 是負值或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> to the equivalent 64-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值轉換為對等的 64 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit unsigned integer equivalent to the value of <paramref name="d" />.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元不帶正負號的整數，等於 <paramref name="d" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the integral part of the decimal value; fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是值的十進位; 不可或缺的一部分小數點後數字會被截斷。

trans-unit.source: You can also convert a <xref:System.Decimal> value to an 64-bit unsigned integer by using the <xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A> assignment operator.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以轉換<xref:System.Decimal>要使用的 64 位元不帶正負號整數值<xref:System.Decimal.op_Explicit%2A>指派運算子。

trans-unit.source: Because the operator performs a narrowing conversion, you must use a casting operator in C# or a conversion function in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 運算子執行縮小轉換，因為您必須使用轉型運算子，在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的轉換函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Decimal.ToUInt64%2A> method to convert decimal numbers to <xref:System.UInt64> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Decimal.ToUInt64%2A>方法，將轉換的十進位數字<xref:System.UInt64>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="d" /> is negative or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt64.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> 是負值或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt64.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to truncate.
trans-unit.target: 要截斷的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the integral digits of the specified <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />; any fractional digits are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 的整數數字；捨棄任何小數數字。

trans-unit.source: The result of <paramref name="d" /> rounded toward zero, to the nearest whole number.
trans-unit.target: 將 <paramref name="d" /> 趨近零捨入為最接近之整數的結果。

trans-unit.source: This method rounds `d` toward zero, to the nearest whole number, which corresponds to discarding any digits after the decimal point.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會四捨五入`d`趨近零到最接近的整數，它會對應至小數點後捨棄任何數字。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the `Truncate` method to discard the fractional digits of several `Decimal` values.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用`Truncate`方法來捨棄小數的數個`Decimal`值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number to its <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將數字的字串表示，轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />。

trans-unit.source: A return value indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值會指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number to its <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將數字的字串表示，轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />。

trans-unit.source: A return value indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值會指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="s" /> was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 轉換成功，則為 <paramref name="s" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This overload differs from the <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method by returning a Boolean value that indicates whether the parse operation succeeded instead of returning the parsed numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載不同於<xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>藉由傳回布林值，指出是否剖析作業成功而不是傳回的已剖析的數字值的方法。

trans-unit.source: It eliminates the need to use exception handling to test for a <xref:System.FormatException> in the event that `s` is invalid and cannot be successfully parsed.
trans-unit.target: 它不需要使用例外狀況處理來測試<xref:System.FormatException>的`s`無效，無法成功剖析。

trans-unit.source: Parameter `s` contains a number of the form:
trans-unit.target: 參數`s`包含數字的格式：

trans-unit.source: [ws][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional-digits][ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional-digits][ws]

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每個項目。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *簽署*

trans-unit.source: An optional sign.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的符號。

trans-unit.source: *digits*
trans-unit.target: *digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從 0 到 9 的數字序列。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific thousands separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的千分位分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的小數點符號。

trans-unit.source: *fractional-digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional-digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從 0 到 9 的數字序列。

trans-unit.source: Parameter `s` is interpreted using the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number?displayProperty=nameWithType> style.
trans-unit.target: 參數`s`解譯使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number?displayProperty=nameWithType>樣式。

trans-unit.source: This means that white space and thousands separators are allowed but currency symbols are not.
trans-unit.target: 這表示泛空白字元和千位分隔符號所允許但不是貨幣符號。

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the elements (such as currency symbols, thousands separators, and white space) that can be present in `s`, use the <xref:System.Decimal.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Decimal%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要明確定義的項目 (例如貨幣符號、 千位分隔符號和空白字元) 可以出現在`s`，使用<xref:System.Decimal.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Decimal%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: Parameter `s` is parsed using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object initialized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 參數`s`會剖析使用的格式設定資訊中<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件初始化為目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To parse a string using the formatting information of some other specified culture, use the <xref:System.Decimal.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Decimal%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要剖析字串以使用其他的格式設定資訊指定文化特性，請使用<xref:System.Decimal.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Decimal%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: If necessary, the value of `s` is rounded using rounding to nearest.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，值`s`會四捨五入為最接近。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Decimal> object has 29 digits of precision.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Decimal>物件具有 29 個位數的有效位數。

trans-unit.source: If `s` represents a number that has more than 29 digits, but has a fractional part and is within the range of <xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue> and <xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>, the number is rounded, not truncated, to 29 digits using rounding to nearest.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`代表有超過 29 個位數，但具有小數部分的範圍內的數字<xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue>和<xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>，數字會四捨五入，不會被截斷，以使用四捨五入為最接近的 29 個位數。

trans-unit.source: If during a parse operation a separator is encountered in the `s` parameter, and the applicable currency or number decimal and group separators are the same, the parse operation assumes that the separator is a decimal separator rather than a group separator.
trans-unit.target: 如果在剖析作業期間出現分隔符號`s`參數，以及適用的貨幣或十進位數字和群組分隔符號是相同的則剖析作業會假設分隔符號是十進位的分隔符號，而不是群組分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: For more information about separators, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>, and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>，和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Decimal.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Decimal%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to convert the string representations of numeric values to <xref:System.Decimal> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Decimal.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Decimal%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，將數值的字串表示轉換<xref:System.Decimal>值。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that en-US is the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設該 EN-US 是目前的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates the permitted format of <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，表示允許的 <c>s</c> 格式。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number" />.
trans-unit.target: 一般會指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific parsing information about <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供關於 <c>s</c> 的文化特性特定剖析資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number to its <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> equivalent using the specified style and culture-specific format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的樣式和特定文化特性格式，將數字的字串表示轉換為其對等的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />。

trans-unit.source: A return value indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值會指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="s" /> was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 轉換成功，則為 <paramref name="s" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This overload differs from the <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method by returning a Boolean value that indicates whether the parse operation succeeded instead of returning the parsed numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載不同於<xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>藉由傳回布林值，指出是否剖析作業成功而不是傳回的已剖析的數字值的方法。

trans-unit.source: It eliminates the need to use exception handling to test for a <xref:System.FormatException> in the event that `s` is invalid and cannot be successfully parsed.
trans-unit.target: 它不需要使用例外狀況處理來測試<xref:System.FormatException>的`s`無效，無法成功剖析。

trans-unit.source: The `style` parameter defines the allowable format of the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed.
trans-unit.target: `style`參數定義的允許格式`s`剖析作業成功的參數。

trans-unit.source: It must be a combination of bit flags from the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 它必須從位元旗標的組合<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members are not supported:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>不支援的成員：

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of style, the `s` parameter may include the following elements:
trans-unit.target: 根據的樣式值`s`參數可以包含下列項目：

trans-unit.source: [ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional-digits][e[sign]digits][ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional-digits][e[sign]digits][ws]

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每個項目。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 空白字元可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: It can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 它可以出現在結尾`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific currency symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的貨幣符號。

trans-unit.source: Its position in the string is defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the `provider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在字串中的位置由定義<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>所傳回物件<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法`provider`參數。

trans-unit.source: The currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 貨幣符號可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *簽署*

trans-unit.source: An optional sign.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的符號。

trans-unit.source: *digits*
trans-unit.target: *digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從 0 到 9 的數字序列。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的小數點符號。

trans-unit.source: *fractional-digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional-digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從 0 到 9 的數字序列。

trans-unit.source: The `style` parameter specifies the permitted format of the `s` parameter, and can be one or more <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumerated constants combined using a bitwise OR operation.
trans-unit.target: `style`參數指定的允許的格式`s`參數，而且可以是下列一或多個<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>列舉常數的使用位元 OR 運算結合在一起。

trans-unit.source: If `style` is null, `s` is interpreted using the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number?displayProperty=nameWithType> style.
trans-unit.target: 如果`style`為 null，`s`解譯使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Number?displayProperty=nameWithType>樣式。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation such as a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> or <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>實作這類<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter supplies culture-specific information used in parsing.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數提供用於剖析的特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the thread current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `provider` 是 `null`，則會使用執行緒目前的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Decimal> object has 29 digits of precision.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Decimal>物件具有 29 個位數的有效位數。

trans-unit.source: If `s` represents a number that has more than 29 digits, but has a fractional part and is within the range of <xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue> and <xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>, the number is rounded, not truncated, to 29 digits using rounding to nearest.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`代表有超過 29 個位數，但具有小數部分的範圍內的數字<xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue>和<xref:System.Decimal.MinValue>，數字會四捨五入，不會被截斷，以使用四捨五入為最接近的 29 個位數。

trans-unit.source: If a separator is encountered in the `s` parameter during a parse operation, and the applicable currency or number decimal and group separators are the same, the parse operation assumes that the separator is a decimal separator rather than a group separator.
trans-unit.target: 如果發現中分隔符號`s`期間剖析作業，以及適用的貨幣或十進位數的參數和群組分隔符號都相同，剖析作業會假設分隔符號是十進位的分隔符號，而不是群組分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: For more information about separators, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>, and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>，和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Decimal.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Decimal%40%29> method to parse the string representation of a number that has a particular style and is formatted using the conventions of a particular culture.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Decimal.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Decimal%40%29>方法來剖析具有特定樣式，並使用特定文化特性的慣例來格式化數字的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="style" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberStyles" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="style" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="style" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="style" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Represents the number zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 表示數字零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of the `Zero` field.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明使用`Zero`欄位。
